attributes.additional_details: Since devolution of powers has been promised to Scotland it is now urgent that the citizens of England have their own control over Finance and NHS. I propose that England have a referendum on actual 'Independance' from the other countries that make up the UK. THE GOVERNMENT should schedule a vote in a period not to exceed one year.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: England To Leave The UK Referendum

Created by: Jon Mitchell

Closing: 30/03/2015
